name: Berry Bear
description:
Berry Bear loves collecting berries.  

Choose Berry Bear's outfit before going berry picking.  Then,  using your arrow keys or WASD to collect the good berries while avoiding the poison berries.  

This game is a topdown endless runner casual game.  

All art and sound effects were created by me.  The music was arranged in GarageBand using their existing loops.  

Known bug -- Berry Bear doesn't seem to want to wear your outfit until level two. One day this might be fixed but for now Berry Bear just wants to wear his own thing in Level 1. 

First Game Published
